vlive.korean: 다시 한번 전열을 가다듬고 있는 한국 팀입니다. Again, the Korean team has possession. 듣기 View video 병만TV : EP. Basketball 조던이 와도 못 막을 김병만
vlive.english: Again, the Korean team has possession.

vlive.korean: 어? 전열이다. 스페셜 게스트. Oh? Jeonyeol is here. Our special guest. 듣기 View video Happy Robot Records : [THE KOXX] 빈&송 수요미식단
vlive.english: Oh? Jeonyeol is here. Our special guest.

vlive.korean: 오늘 아까 전화 오더라고, 7시쯤에. 전열이가... He called me at around 7. 듣기 View video Happy Robot Records : [THE KOXX] 빈&송 수요미식단
전열이와 터치했습니다. - 감사합니다. Jeonyeol left and the food came. - Thank you. 듣기 View video Happy Robot Records : [THE KOXX] 빈&송 수요미식단
vlive.english: Jeonyeol left and the food came. - Thank you.

vlive.korean: 앉아봐. 사실 전열이가 오늘... - 조금만 더 들어가봐. Sit down. - Move to your left a little. 듣기 View video Happy Robot Records : [THE KOXX] 빈&송 수요미식단
vlive.english: Sit down. - Move to your left a little.

examples.korean: They regrouped their forces and renewed the attack. 발음듣기 그들은 병력을 재편성하여[전열을 다시 가다듬어] 공격을 재개했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They regrouped their forces and renewed the attack. 발음

examples.korean: Fires started because of overheated electric heaters. 발음듣기 전열기 과열로 화재가 발생했다 Neungyule
examples.english: Fires started because of overheated electric heaters. 발음

examples.korean: Before the game, the players braced themselves. 발음듣기 선수들은 경기를 앞두고 전열을 가다듬었다 Neungyule
examples.english: Before the game, the players braced themselves. 발음

examples.korean: the order of battle 발음듣기 전투 서열(序列), 전열(battle array). Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
In winter, we use electric space heaters under our desks. 발음듣기 겨울에 우리는 책상 아래에 전열기를 두고 사용한다. Neungyule
examples.english: In winter, we use electric space heaters under our desks. 발음
